A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: i got to see a early screening of Star Wars The Last Jedi and oh my god this movie was amazing\, Rian Johnson did a terrific job with expanding the mythology\, giving the characters more depth\, awesome action set pieces and a strory and plot twists that had me on the edge of seat\, Star Wars is definitely worth seeing more than. once and I can gladly say its one of my favorite Star Wars movies
